ygData.subject: Re: Smithing Info Request
ygData.msgSnippet: This would be most appreciated. The weird little question I have is: sharpening stone and rusty weapon and forger get you tarnished weapon. tarnished weapon
ygData.messageBody:
This would be most appreciated.

The weird little question I have is:

sharpening stone and rusty weapon and forger get you tarnished weapon.

tarnished weapon and what get you a regular weapon??

B

> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> Was wondering if someone would be so kind as to post/repost a complete
> listing of items you can create/make with blacksmithing, the approximate
> level they become trivial, the minimum skill level you'd recommend before
> trying to create/make them, and the approximate resale value to other
> players. I know this was posted once before, but don't know what happened to
> my copy - (I guess that's what I get for using a free email service). Thanks
> in advance!
